name: LinkTap
0:
”Alexa, ask LinkTap when it water again.”
”Alexa, ask LinkTap to stop watering.”
”Alexa, ask LinkTap to use interval mode.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: linktap
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can change your water timer's work mode, start or stop watering, enable or disable Rain Skip, check device's status, and more! Before you get started, be sure you own an LinkTap gateway and wireless water timer(s) and have an account on our app for iPhone or Android. To use the LinkTap skill for Amazon Alexa, click 'Enable Skill' button to link your LinkTap account with the Alexa. After successful connection you can begin using commands like:

"Alexa, ask LinkTap to start watering for ten minutes."
"Alexa, ask LinkTap to use interval mode."
"Alexa, ask LinkTap to use odd-even mode."
"Alexa, ask LinkTap to use 7-day mode."
"Alexa, ask LinkTap how much battery left."

For a complete list of commands, visit https://www.link-tap.com/alexa
